title: Textile, 1000–1470
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft in plain weave foundation; Open balanced plain weave patterned by weft faced bands on grouped warps and brocaded extra weft floats. Made from 7 woven pieces, each with a continuous warp, the
description: Loin cloth. Four horizontal bands, each about 2.25 inches high by 11 inches long, containing alternating diagonal rows of birds, interlocked "wave scrolls" and fish (?) in yellow, tan, pink, red, and purple wool; banded top and botton by two brown and one yellow weft stripe; decorating three lengths of plain woven natural cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1000–1470. Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft in plain weave foundation; Open balanced plain weave patterned by weft faced bands on grouped warps and brocaded extra weft floats. Made from 7 woven pieces, each with a continuous warp, the. 1968-74-1.
